attributes.action: Animal cruelty should end up with 5 years in prison
attributes.additional_details: Teenagers stole a dog and tortured him (fed him drugs,broke his leg,broke his neck,punched and kicked him then left him for dead and set him on fire)Luckily the dog survived but they they didn’t get a harsh enough punishment (they were not allowed to keep any animals for 5 years and had to pay a fine)they should have got 5 years in prison
attributes.background: If caught abusing animals (dogs,cats,rabbits,gerbils and any more)or commiting offense of animal cruelty they should end up with 5 years in prison instead of 2 years
